title: Language Communication Competency Enhancement Training for Older Workers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic vocational language comprehension and secondary-level communication skills
context.additional_context: Scenario-based collaborative learning environment reflecting actual workplace settings. Task design considers the learning characteristics and digital accessibility constraints of older workers

learning_goals: Practice at least five situational communication strategies for workplace collaboration with older workers
Create a portfolio analyzing three types of language barriers that may occur in multicultural environments
Design an older worker training module through team projects and conduct peer evaluations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
